column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Vy - Thanks for the great review. I think you bring up a good point -- I have noticed my carrier
column3: does not provide the best reception inside our restaurant
column4: though the tons of metal gym equipment upstairs from us may have something to do with that
column7: I'm glad you enjoyed our tapas and ramen dishes
column8: and we hope you come back and try some more of our options. Thanks again
column9: and we look forward to serving you again soon!
